dict.acceptation: 演员（尤指男演员）；行动者；参与者；

sent.orig: When actor acts, the use case begin.
sent.trans: 当Actor有所行动时，此用例随即开始。

sent.orig: AOC calculus is asynchronous pi-calculus which is enriched with actor mechanisim and reinterpreted.
sent.trans: AOC演算是扩充了Actor机制并且被重新解释了的异步Pi演算。

sent.orig: An actor who mouths his speeches is a poor actor.
sent.trans: 念台词装腔作势的演员是拙劣的演员。

sent.orig: An actor who mouths his words is a poor actor.
sent.trans: 装腔作势背诵台词的演员不是好演员。

sent.orig: I'm an actor, and any actor worth his saIt can cry on cue.
sent.trans: 你要知道，我是个专业演员所有演员都能在自我暗示下哭起来。
